articles.title: Christy Lam
articles.contents:
Christy Lam
          
          
          Home
          Portfolio
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Christy Lam
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Hi there!
            I am a data programmer and analyst with the Puget Sound Regional Council (PSRC). As a member of the data science team, I work on general automation projects, dashboard building, and promoting R (see my post on why I like R). When not dabbling in code, I’m catching up on the latest K-drama, improving my chocolate chip cookie baking skills, and admiring beautiful UI designs.
            
            Education
            Certificate in Front-end Development
            University of Washington Professional and Continuing Education, 2020
            BA in Geography (Geographic Information Systems)
            University of Washington, 2007
            
            
            Now
            Developing an introductory class on Shiny as part of PSRC’s R Learning Series 2020-21
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Christy Lam
